name: Smart Mirror
body:
### Welcome to smart-mirror.io
This is a placeholder page that will soon contain more information about the smart mirror, including:
* Full tutorial on how to build the smart mirror
* Upcoming features and changelogs
* Developer support

### Go get the code
In the meantime head over to the [Smart Mirror](https://github.com/evancohen/smart-mirror) GitHub repository to download the source and get started.

### Author
[Evan Cohen](http://evanbtcohen.com) | (@evancohen)

### Support or Contact
Please see the [Gitter Chat](https://gitter.im/evancohen/smart-mirror) or [file an issue](https://github.com/evancohen/smart-mirror/issues)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
